post.body: i only get one day a month, but i savor it!!
i have been feeling like it's friday, but that's bc i'm working from home tomorrow.but i have to come in Fri.which will suck...
you make me wish it was Friday, lol. or that i didn't have to work tomorrow!
that's weird
I think you're too young to reference things "in your youth!" :-)
if you invented something like that you'd be the most famous person ever! in the world.
imitation is the sincerest form of flattery. :-D
i'm about to have tea for two myself; in about an hour, at any rate.
I guess that's just as well, bc no matter how hard I try, it doesn't seem that I'm any closer to attaining it! :-/
as much.
well, i guess if it's not a labor of love, it doesn't matter...
i know, i use both things at least once or twice a week, lol! how is the studying going?
and yet, kinda hot! lol.
rofl. awesome.
"warning: tweeting and driving may lead to spontaneous hilarity!"
i am observing that you drink a lot of coffee and eat a lot of egg sandwiches.
maybe you could find some non awful work people to exit early with...
no, you don't! these are just pop in, grab a drink, smile, drink, leave events!
yes, i think that would be a much better party!
that is a drag. you should have a work xmas party on a weeknight, to make the week go faster, not on a Friday!!
the one with the fresh mozzarella. or the one with the chicken and pesto. good times.
i am so sad, they closed the cosi by my Loop office. sad! i miss the melty sandwiches!
mmmm, caramel. mmmmm. :-)
sweet! :-D
how 'bout a way of getting someone else to pay them? does that count as a legitimate problem? :-P
actually, you spelled it correctly. :-) i haven't been to NYC in about a decade, but I'm sure it's crazy with Sbux, lol.
yeah, they usually are cookie-cutter. there are so many here, every two or three blocks in some places.
lol. there are so many starbucks here. do you have a lot of them over there?
BOOOOOOO!
and my cats... ... ... lol.
don't train him too well, or he will expect tips! ;-)
yeah, overly nice people, especially if they smile too much, creep me out.
gee, now you're making me miss him and I don't even know him yet, lol!
i'll trade you. you can write ons of boring emails and I will do artwork! i would so love to do artwork! what wld u rather b doing?
well, you better take a three hour lunch or something, to equalize! :-P
lol,well,ur Tweets abt him inspired me 2 follow him,but since he's MIA & I don't know him,guess I'll have 2 take ur wrd 4 it!:)
please don't go insane, we would all be sad if they had to put you in a straightjacket and lock you up! :-P
well, you should solicit @jackmoore sightings and we could track him.Like Santa. Or a hurricane. :-P
thanks for that visual...
safe travels!
he co-followed me at some point during the night, so he must not have dropped completely off the face of the earth...
congratulations, that's a big deal! yay! you won't starve now! :-D
you're in it now! :-P
yeah, it's the law of threes.
just gross, lol. dirty slush, mmmmmm.
did you make it in, despite the freezing rain? the sidewalks in my hood are solid sheets of ice...
your office sounds much more fun than mine...
yeah, i put a three day cap on family interactions whenever possible. try to ditch them a few days and enjoy Mexico by yourself! :-D
yeah, i don't think i'd be able to do it. at least not on my own.
hee hee, mission accomplished, then! :-P
here is something boring: i'm abt to take a nap bc my ride doesn't leave to go to friend's till midnightish... Zzzzzz :-P
thanks, I did!
GAH! you had to remind me of them?? :-P
not too bad, how are you?
what happened last night?
i still don't get it.maybe it's bc i haven't yet had any coffee this morning? :/
...my cat were okay.And,again,bc I am a huge idiot. :-( this is a litmus test,tho,bc i don't really know if we can be friends.
because i am a huge idiot who needs a brain transplant!Bc I told him we cld be friends.Bc he textd me24 times yesterday 2 see if i &...
i think you lost me..?
lol,yeah,i might as well look at the bright side. then i shld go get my head examined! :-P
oh,no,sounds like i'm bttr than u!except tht i'm going 2 spend the day shopping w/guy who dumped me 2 wks ago.so maybe i'm ill,2!:/
yes, they have healing properties! :-D
getting out of here! bye for now!
just got round trip tickets to san fran for 5 bucks. love those frequent flyer miles-- thanks Mom!
baaaacck for another coupla hours, siiiiiggggghhh
out to lunch
yeesh. i wish i knew my own mind a little better. or, maybe if my own mind ever decided to act like an adult...
home and thawing out. only slipped twice, didn't fall once!
everyone's drinking lattes and cappuccinos and now i'm jealous. i'm cutting out of here early and getting my own! :-P laters, Tweeps!
my friend said i just hit crazy town. i was feeling pretty rational.
thinking about crawling under my desk and hiding
in the office. whoo hoo.
okay... off to work work work. in the cold cold cold. (it's 7 again right now...)
going to try and nap bf having to catch ride to burbs
I would DM every1,but not sure how 2.So,2morrow,no internet possibly.In tht case,want 2 wish u all a vry happy holiday!thx 4 all the convos!
signing off for a bit, probably for the night. have a good one!
shopping accomplished. getting ready to have good food. what's new, tweeps?
out to shop in the snow, have a nice evening, all!
morning Twitterland! What's new today?
good night Twitter friends. Tucking in my sick cat and then myself! Buon notte!
